data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Graf, Wolfram, Pauls, Steffen U., Vitecek, Simon (2018): Isoperla vjosae sp. n., a new species of the Isoperla tripartita group from Albania (Plecoptera: Perlodidae). Zootaxa 4370 (2): 171-179, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.2.5|2 occurrences
